actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 17 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that bankruptcy judges and magistrates may receive cost-of-living adjustments to their annuities after ceasing the practice of law, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for cost-of-living adjustments to the annuities of bankruptcy judges and magistrates after they cease practicing law.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 17 of title 28, United States Code, to provide that bankruptcy judges and magistrates may receive cost-of-living adjustments to their annuities after ceasing the practice of law, and for other purposes.
